name: Ashton - Aged Maduro - Pyramid
additionalNotes: The never-hurried natural fermentation of an exquisite Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper ensures profound flavor in Ashton Aged Maduro. Beneath the wrapper rests a vintage interior of vibrant Dominican tobaccos. Notes of dark cocoa, molasses, almond, maple, and black pepper illustrate amazing transitions of taste. Ashton Aged Maduro is the premier companion to coffee, rum, cognac, and fine desserts.
